name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-live-code-interview-nodejs
title: Live coding interview using Shared meeting stage
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates live coding interviews in Microsoft Teams using the Live Share SDK, enabling participants to collaboratively solve coding questions in real time.
longDescription: This sample application showcases live coding interviews in Microsoft Teams, leveraging the Live Share SDK for real-time collaboration. Participants can select coding questions from a side panel, allowing them to write and edit code together, with all changes instantly reflected for everyone in the meeting.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing live coding interview using shared meeting stage

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
